## sendTo() function

Sends an event to an actor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function sendTo<TContext extends MachineContext, TExpressionEvent extends EventObject, TExpressionAction extends ParameterizedObject | undefined, TTargetActor extends AnyActorRef, TEvent extends EventObject, TDelay extends string>(to: TTargetActor | string | ((args: ActionArgs<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent>) => TTargetActor | string), eventOrExpr: EventFrom<TTargetActor> | SendExpr<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, InferEvent<Cast<EventFrom<TTargetActor>, EventObject>>, TEvent>, options?: SendToActionOptions<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, NoInfer<TEvent>, NoInfer<TDelay>>): SendToAction<TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent, TDelay>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | TTargetActor \| string \| ((args: [ActionArgs](./xstate.actionargs.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent&gt;) =&gt; TTargetActor \| string) |  |
|  eventOrExpr | [EventFrom](./xstate.eventfrom.md)<></>&lt;TTargetActor&gt; \| [SendExpr](./xstate.sendexpr.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, [InferEvent](./xstate.inferevent.md)<></>&lt;[Cast](./xstate.cast.md)<></>&lt;[EventFrom](./xstate.eventfrom.md)<></>&lt;TTargetActor&gt;, [EventObject](./xstate.eventobject.md)<></>&gt;&gt;, TEvent&gt; |  |
|  options | [SendToActionOptions](./xstate.sendtoactionoptions.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TEvent&gt;, [NoInfer](./xstate.noinfer.md)<></>&lt;TDelay&gt;&gt; | _(Optional)_ Send action options - <code>id</code> - The unique send event identifier (used with <code>cancel()</code>). - <code>delay</code> - The number of milliseconds to delay the sending of the event. |

**Returns:**

[SendToAction](./xstate.sendtoaction.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TExpressionEvent, TExpressionAction, TEvent, TDelay&gt;
